title: Ethnobotanical survey and phytochemistry of medicinal plants used in the management of HIV/AIDS in Eastern Uganda
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Richard Oriko Owor, Carol Kawuma, Gauden Nantale, Kenedy Kiyimba, Samuel Baker Obakiro, Simple Ouma, Jalia Lulenzi, Yahaya Gavamukulya, Mercy Chebijira, Tonny Wotoyitide Lukwago, Moses Egor, Peter Musagala, Moses Andima, Dan Kibuule, Paul Waako, Joseph Hokello
